venue.name: McDonalds Resturant at Alton Traffic Circle

item.description:
Join us for a hike and some good old spelunking, (cave exploring).  We will meet at the McDonalds at the Alton Traffic circle and either carpool from there or play follow the leader as we head over to the hiking trail in New Durham.

We will be hiking and spelunking for about three hours. Please bring a flashlight, some good hiking shoes, courage, and food as we will have lunch on top of the mountain. This is a very easy hike and anyone can do this. Please limit the size of your backpacks, the cave can be narrow in spots.

The cave is dark, so bring a flashlight or headlamp! If you are afraid of the dark you can hike around the cave and meet us at the top of the cave where we will regroup and then hike to the top of the mountain. The total trip should be about three hours.

We will be joined by other meetup groups.

For your convenience, a Hannaford supermarket is right next to the McDonald's - that way you can get some extra food for your leader!

If anyone has any questions my phone number is: 603-312-6735

Please try to be there on time as we will depart McDonald's at 11:15 am. Please anticipate any delays in traffic and arrive early as everyone wants to go spelunking!

A $2. donation would be appreciated for running this event and this meetup group.

See you there!



Peter
item.name: Spelunking / Hiking Trip at Devils Den Mountain
